text:
1.4. Recurrent Neural Networks for Time Series 6
The key attribute of the CNN is conducting diﬀerent processing units [...] Such a
variety of processing units can yield an eﬀective representation of local salience of
the signals. Then, the deep architecture allows multiple layers of these processing
units to be stacked, so that this deep learning model can characterize the salience of
signals in diﬀerent scales.
— Deep Convolutional Neural Networks On Multichannel Time Series For Human Activity
